name: A Runist And His Forcefield
description:
A Runist And His Forcefield

This game was created for the Flame Games Jam #2

Theme: Textless

This game was designed as a textless typing game. Instead of words appearing on the screen which you would have to type, runes appear which must be cast by drawing them!

Controls

Use the NUMPAD in order to cast your spells! Draw lines by connecting boxes in a 3 by 3 grid representative of the numpad on screen. 

Press SPACE to clear the rune you have drawn. It must be exactly the same as the one you see, so draw carefully!

(A numpad is highly recommended, but QWEASDZXC will also work)

Background

You are a runist, a master of the magical arts who uses runes to cast spells! Your castle is under siege, and you have been called upon to protect your kingdom from the attackers. Cast protective spells to maintain your forcefield for as long as you can!
